metadata.title: CVE-2022-4245 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in codehaus-plexus. Theorg.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.XmlWriterUtil#writeComment fails to sanitizecomments for a --> sequence. This issue means that text contained in thecommand string could be interpreted as XML and allow for XML injection.

criterions.comment: plexus-utils2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
